targets.query:
from(bucket: "data-bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.sensor_id == "${sensor_id}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "board_counter")

from(bucket: "data-bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.sensor_id == "${sensor_id}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "bme280_temp")

from(bucket: "data-bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.sensor_id == "${sensor_id}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "bme280_hum")

from(bucket: "data-bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.sensor_id == "${sensor_id}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "bme280_pres")

from(bucket: "data-bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.sensor_id == "${sensor_id}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "sps30_PM1" or r._field == "sps30_PM2" or r._field == "sps30_PM10" or r._field == "sps30_PM4" or r._field == "opcn3_PM1" or r._field == "opcn3_PM25" or r._field == "opcn3_PM10")

from(bucket: "data-bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.sensor_id == "${sensor_id}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "AD_socket_1_1" or r._field == "AD_socket_1_2" or r._field == "AD_socket_2_1" or r._field == "AD_socket_2_2")

from(bucket: "data-bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.sensor_id == "${sensor_id}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "AD_socket_3_1" or r._field == "AD_socket_3_2" or r._field == "AD_socket_4_1" or r._field == "AD_socket_4_2")

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.sensor_id == "${sensor_id}")
